Electrical Engineering Department

The Electrical Engineering department focuses on the study and application of electricity, electronics, and electromagnetism. Our program covers a broad range of topics, including power systems, control systems, signal processing, and microelectronics. We are dedicated to training students to become innovative thinkers and problem-solvers in the field of electrical technology.

Students gain practical experience through a combination of theoretical learning and laboratory work, preparing them for careers in telecommunications, power generation, and embedded systems design.
